subtitle: I'm Karen, a full stack developer

about.title: about_me
about.desc: Hi! I'm a passionate full stack developer with 1 year of experience. I work with the PERN stack (PostgreSQL, Express, React, and NodeJS), and I feel comfortable in both front-end and back-end development. I'm always looking for new opportunities to learn and improve my skills.

ara.title: Ara
ara.desc: A social media-inspired project built with the PERN stack. My first full stack project!

snake.title: Snake Game
snake.desc: The classic snake game, made only with vanilla JS
